Package controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class. Controls the login screen.

    • upcomingAlertSignal

      public void upcomingAlertSignal()
      This method finds meetings starting within 15 minutes and alerts the user. If there are no appointments within 15 minutes there is an alert stating no upcoming meetings in 15 minutes.

      The lambda on line 94 will locate appointments starting within a quarter of an hour from now. It is justified because the code is more efficient, and therefore the program is more efficient.

    • selectUpcomingApps

      public void selectUpcomingApps()
      This method creates reminder list to be checked with the appointment Alert.

    • submitButtonHandler

      public void submitButtonHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method handles the submit button.
      Parameters:
      event - When actioned checks if the login is valid and if so loads the main screen.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • loginActivity

      public void loginActivity(String user)
      This method records each successful login attempt and places them on the file login_activity.txt.
      Parameters:
      user - The username of the person logging in.

    • failedLoginActivity

      public void failedLoginActivity()
      This method records each failed login attempt and places them on the file login_activity.txt.

    • passwordChecker

      public boolean passwordChecker(int userID, String password) throws SQLException
      This method checks if the login password is valid.
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID of the person logging in.
      password - The password of the person logging in.
      Throws:
      SQLException
